GiftReceivingSettings.TogglePermission: On this page, you can toggle the permission settings for receiving gifts. Adjust the settings for each inventory or box.
GiftReceivingSettings.DeleteBoxWarning: When you delete a BOX, the digital items (NFTs) contained within the BOX are also deleted. Please make sure to check the contents of the BOX carefully before proceeding with this action.
GiftReceivingSettings.BoxNameTooLong: The box name is too long.
GiftReceivingSettings.QrCodeSaveInstruction: You can save the QR code by clicking on it.
GiftReceivingSettings.QrCodeCloseInstruction: To close this screen, please click outside the QR code.
